column4: how can i start NetworkManager (network-manager) from command line?
how can i start NetworkManager (network-manager) from command line?
thanks Sanus; it always bothers me how the package name and command are normally different :p
/usr/sbin/NetworkManager, but if you intend on setting network interfaces independantly of GUI load, you will have to do it the old school route by editing /etc/network/interfaces.
